replaceNormalJson.title: Replace normal json highlighting
replaceNormalJson.description: Turn this on if you want to replace atom's default highlighting with the one provided by this package.

customTypes.title: Custom extensions
customTypes.description: If you wish to allow the package to highlight more file types, write them here using comma separated values. (eg: `ext1,ext2,ext3`)

defaultTypes.title: Default extensions:
defaultTypes.description: The list of default file extentions that are highlighted by this package.
